mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM content ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) WHERE rownum<=1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM content ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) WHERE rownum<=8

SELECT content_id, title, contenttype_id,first_image, addr1, tel, event_startdate, event_enddate,agelimit, num FROM (SELECT content_id, title, contenttype_id,first_image, addr1, tel, event_startdate, event_enddate,agelimit, rownum as num FROM (SELECT content.content_id, title, contenttype_id,first_image, addr1, tel, event_startdate, event_enddate,agelimit FROM content, event WHERE content.content_id=event.content_id AND content.cat2='A0207')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM content,event WHERE content.content_id=event.content_id
SELECT * FROM content,event WHERE content.content_id=event.content_id AND content.cat2='A0207' AND content.content_id=#{content_id}
